title: 94/25/EC: Commission Decision of 6 December 1993 concerning the exchange of letters between the European Community and the Republic of Austria on the reciprocal granting of tariff quotas for certain wines (Text with EEA relevance)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 6 December 1993 concerning the exchange of letters between the European Community and the Republic of Austria on the reciprocal granting of tariff quotas for certain wines (Text with EEA relevance) (94/25/EC)
THE  COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
The exchange of letters between the European Community and the Republic of Austria relating to the Bilateral Agreement on the reciprocal tariff quotas for certain wines is hereby approved.
The text of the exchange of letters is attached to this Decision (5).
The text of exchange of letters referred to in Article 1 shall be published in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 6 December 1993.
For the Commission
RenĂŠ STEICHEN
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 113, 7. 5. 1993, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 109, 1. 5. 1993, p. 6.
(3) OJ No L 106, 18. 4. 1989, p. 1.
(4) OJ No L 66, 13. 3. 1991, p. 13.
(5) The letters were signed on 20 December 1993.
